publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2345# Fiona McLeod: Scottish Science Library and Scottish Business Information Service—That the Parliament deplores the recent decision by the National Library for Scotland to close the Scottish Science Library and the Scottish Business Information Service because of funding problems.
S1M-2345# Scottish Science Library and Scottish Business Information Service (lodged on 23 October 2001) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Russell*
S1M-2345# Scottish Science Library and Scottish Business Information Service (lodged on 23 October 2001) Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-2345# Scottish Science Library and Scottish Business Information Service (lodged on 23 October 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-2345# Scottish Science Library and Scottish Business Information Service (lodged on 23 October 2001) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2345# Scottish Science Library and Scottish Business Information Service (lodged on 23 October 2001) Irene McGugan*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2345# Scottish Science Library and Scottish Business Information Service (lodged on 23 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2345# Scottish Science Library and Scottish Business Information Service (lodged on 23 October 2001) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2345# Scottish Science Library and Scottish Business Information Service (lodged on 23 October 2001) Alasdair Morgan*
